column4: Could anyone tell me where I could get help with my monitor problem, I just tested it with Windows and the resolution is detected just fine. Ubuntu handles another exactly similar monitor just fine... what could be wrong?
so, what exactly is your question?
well, what exactly is happening?  U just said that Ubuntu wprked fine with it in your last statement..  see--->   Ubuntu handles another exactly similar monitor just fine...
you will have to look on the wiki for the monitor specific type of issues that you are having..
